definition[0]: in British horse-racing, the title for winning the St Leger, the Derby, and the Two Thousand Guineas
definition[1]: in American horse-racing, the title for winning the Kentucky Derby, the Preakness, and the Belmont Stakes
definition[2]: in Rugby Union, the title for beating all three of the other home countries
definition[3]: a title given to the baseball player who is the best hitter in his league in three different categories (category)
